comments.message: Hi Jonathan, interesting post! Any chance you could find an image to go along with it? Images help grab attention and tell a story with higher impact. You should be able to use the Update Entry button on the right of your post and follow the instructions to add images from there. We know occasionally people have issues uploading images so let us know by hitting the Feedback button at the bottom of most pages of our site if you face any problems. Looking forward to seeing more of your inspiring insights on OpenIDEO. And here's some tips on adding visual goodness to your idea: http://ideo.pn/vis-uals plus more on evolving your thought-starter: http://ideo.pn/oi-evolve

summary: It seems  to me that removing the top set of gloves will contaminate the under gloves.My suggestion in a nutshell...Attach a rubber band to the  glove  with superglue and  use a hook to remove possibly a nail in a wooden beam.Manufacture the gloves with a plastic tab that allows it to be pulled off without contact with under gloves. Also a hook and bin system.
title: Simple ppe glove addition
